title: #問#更新（含聯絡bighit方式）（擴散希望） 泰亨受到威脅
content:
感謝每個點進來的你💜💜💜

更新了一些可以聯絡Bighit的方式
米們直接複製直接複製就可以了
我是整理一些Army發出來讓大家擴散的文案
（也呼籲米們理性應付這件事情，專注自家哥哥們，刷音源，看跑彈，蹲直播，投投票🥰🥰）


1.推特 直接在推特上發這篇內容就可以
We've heard of a personal threat to the BigHit artist, BTS V. You need to be thoroughly prepared. It's your first priority. It's your duty as his agency. Please disclose publicly how you'll handle it. We look forward to your prompt response.
@BigHitEnt @bts_bighit @hitmanb

2.email給BigHit（要附上截圖，就是我文章po的那幾張）
🔔郵件標題:“Kimtaehyung Death threats”🔔
🔔版本1:
Date of the post: 2019/11/11
Platform used to share the threats:
Twitter
http://t.cn/AiriE6Dd (This is the link for the person who received the threats).
Author of the threats: @maro5001
http://t.cn/AiriE6DD 

The threats were made against Kim Taehyung (김태형), better detailed in the screenshots down below. They say that they'll attend at BTS's events in December, also saying that "we did not start this war, but it is we who will end it.", from their words.
We ask for the company to take the appropriated measures against these people and to protect our artist and idol, this may be only threats,but it's better to prevent.
Please protect all members.
Thank you for your kind attention.

🔔版本2:（這是直接寫出那幾張威脅的內容，但最好還是能一同附上截圖，因為那個人id已經被封了）
1. November.9 2019
2. Twitter
3. ID: @maro5001
4.
Death Threat sent to@KTH FanBase

targeting Kim Taehyung through another fanbase. They revealed their size and warned about a December attack calling it "war".See below:

"say goodbye to your bias becausein December he will disappear from planet earth. We did not start thiswar, but it is we who will end it."

"Do you think I'm alone? lol we are more than 753 people, 4 of which go to all BTS events in December.You started a war with us when you closed a project dedicated to *t*, l'm just a translator, l'm here to convey the instructions of my boss'
"#TaehyungtheywillblockyourairinDecember'

5. Please see attached screenshots of the threats.
（如果沒有存截圖的米可以把第五句給刪了，再加上一些自己想說的話吧(๑•̀ㅁ•́ฅ)

🔔email: (更新（說實話，email的部分我不確定，目前推跟微博好像主要是寄給第一個，但是我點進去發現是大黑官網...!? 第二個也是我查到army說可以report的信箱，但是幾年前的文了，所以不確定行不行，目前在大黑各種官方網站，我都沒有查到聯絡方式><，如果有米知道的話，希望可以補充🙏🙏，謝謝大家💜感謝你們）

🔥🔥protect@bighitcorp.com   （有米補充這是官咖認證的舉報email, 推跟微博也是寄這個，所以應該沒有錯）

bighit@ibighit.com
__________________________________

不好意思，想請問一下
昨天刷推特的時候看到其他米轉推了一則貼文
非常震驚
是有人揚言要對泰亨下手(°Д°)
（且他說他有7百多個同夥）
QQ真的很擔心泰亨的安危
許多米瘋狂@大黑官方和方爸爸之外
也寫信寄給BH

https://i.imgur.com/Px8oZnf.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/fIHcjfH.jpg
就是這個帳號👇
https://i.imgur.com/jqzHj1B.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/OLLeThA.jpg
看到這個我真的怕了...👇
https://i.imgur.com/YRskwFI.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/Lum0MWu.jpg

真的很擔心，但是最後一張貼文推主說
It turns out to be a false alarm....
其實不太明白，所以是誤會嗎？
因為看不懂韓文所以不太懂最後推主想說的...
但是今天微博上也傳開了這件事
請大家寫信給BH

所以這個威脅是真的嗎QQ

接下來年末又有許多頒獎典禮
我無法想像如果有想傷害他們的人混在群眾之中...
泰亨要好好的啊，七個人都要好好的
